duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide oversight from conception to implementation of technical programs, including strategies, processes, and resources.
Manage and track program schedule, task details, and project resources using project management tools.
Anticipate future needs and allocate resources to achieve program objectives on time and within budget.
Ensure alignment of programs, strategies, and processes with the division’s direction and business objectives.
Lead and provide technical expertise to multifunctional design teams to achieve project/program goals.
Interface with division senior management, provide status updates, and prepare for release and deployment of programs.
Contribute and participate in technical review boards for assigned programs.
Stay abreast of new developments and industry knowledge to drive necessary changes in policy and practice.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Master's Degree preferred
